column4: Tesla stock falls on wider loss  CEO comments on cash need
column5: DETROIT Shares of Tesla Motors Inc  fell about 6 percent on Wednesday after the electric car maker posted a wider quarterly loss and said it may raise more cash to offset heavy spending on expanded production.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla stock falls on wider loss  CEO comments on cash need
column5: DETROIT  Aug 5 Shares of Tesla Motors Inc  fell about 6 percent on Wednesday after the electric car maker posted a wider quarterly loss and said it may raise more cash to offset heavy spending on expanded production.

column4: Tesla CEO says battery sales could hit 'a few billion dollars' in 2017
column5: DETROIT Tesla Motors Inc's  new storage battery business could generate "a few billion dollars" in revenue in 2017  Chief Executive Elon Musk told analysts on Wednesday.

column4: Electric car maker Tesla's net loss widens in 2nd quarter
column5: DETROIT  Aug 5 Electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc's net loss widened in the second quarter  and it continued to burn through cash ahead of the launch of its Model X crossover car and the opening of its Nevada battery factory  the company said Wednesday.
